name: Nofollow External/Outbound Link (SEO)
author: Sumit Malviya

sections.description:
The Nofollow External/Outbound Link plugin is designed to enhance your website’s SEO capabilities by automatically adding a rel=”nofollow” attribute to external hyperlinks. This simple yet powerful tool helps safeguard your site from potential outbound link penalties while maintaining optimal link equity flow within your content.

With no complex backend configurations required, this plugin seamlessly integrates into your WordPress site. Upon activation, it works silently in the background, applying the rel=”nofollow” attribute to all external links across your website. This proactive approach ensures that search engine crawlers recognize these links as non-endorsements, helping you maintain control over your site’s link profile.

Ideal for SEO practitioners, website administrators, and content creators alike, the Nofollow External/Outbound Link plugin offers peace of mind and enhances your site’s SEO performance effortlessly.

No backend setting required:

Just install and activate you don’t need to do any setting configuration
from the backend.

It automatically applies on the external links.
sections.installation:
Installation Guide :

1.Login to the WordPress Admin
2.Go to Plugins in the Admin menu
3.Click on the Add new button
4.Search plugin for Nofollow External/Outbound Link and click on Install Now
5.Click on the Activate plugin link

Happy 🙂
sections.reviews:
Very helpful works really well !

By Praveen M (praveenmalv) on March 28, 2024

That works really amazing, no need to do anything, just installed and add the nofollow. Very helpful for SEO
